website_summaries.verdict: We like the fast warm-up time and temperature control of these heated gloves. Great for motorcyclists, sports spectators, and outdoor workers.
pros: Medium heat setting provides hours of warmth
cons: Do not warm entire hand, only palm region
Actual gloves may not look like product photo

customer_reviews.title: They were great! I set them to the middle temperature (color ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for use on my motorcycle, which I tried out today (about 40 degrees outside). They were great! I set them to the middle temperature (color green light on the gloves), and was quite comfortable for the next several hours riding them motorcycle. I wish I had them on a previous ride two weeks ago, when it was as cold, and my hands were numb from the cold. I would recommend these to anyone who rides a motorcycle. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: shazzyjeff

customer_reviews.title: WARMS HANDS ONL!!  DOES**NOT**WARM**FINGERS!!!!(ONLY HANDS)
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT HEAT IN THE FINGERS. ONLY HANDS. Probably not good for being outdoors in temps below 30deg etc. Probably Great for 40-50 deg or elderly people who's hands get cold. Im Rating this Product not the Seller. I've been working in Construction OUTDOORS for over 20yrs. What I've finally come to realize is that NOBODY...SELLS...MAKES....MANUFACTURES.... HEATED FIIIIINGER Gloves. I ONLY care about keeping my FINGERS warm. My hands can usually maintain in colder weather but once my FINGERS get frozen, I'm Livid and Can Not Function. So again, These gloves are Great for PALMS ONLY!!!! They WILL NOT keep your FINGERS warm. ONLY HANDS. NOT DIGITS!!!
customer_reviews.author: D Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who has had neuropathy & circulation issues from his diabetes. He has pretty big hands & the XL fit him perfect. He wore them to a football game last night & said they worked great! The only thing I wished that this had was a USB port option to be able to recharge the batteries that way instead of just a wall plug.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Warm Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great - they have a long battery life and 3 different heat settings - they are easy to charge and heat up quickly. I was really impressed with how easy they are to operate and my friends love them too! They aren't touch screen capable though so you have to remove them every time you need to use your phone. And they don't have grippers on them (but most gloves don't) and they can be a little slippery at times.
customer_reviews.author: UFZBR

customer_reviews.title: A good solution gloves for winter fishing
customer_reviews.text: There are certain fishes to catch during the winter and a heated glove is an absolute must as the weather out there is brutal. It's very warm and keeps me out on the deck longer as I face the cold air and wind from the sea. Battery survived my 8 hour fishing trip so I imagine it has a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: BaK41

customer_reviews.title: Eletrice gloves
customer_reviews.text: bought these gloves for my father he said they work very well
customer_reviews.author: Lastat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Had theses for 2 years now .. and they are awesome ! Perfect for any outdoor activity you can possibly imagine
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Husband has trouble with cold fingers due to diabetes. He loves these gloves!!! There are 3 temp settings. This was his favorite Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Terri wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outside use in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. Perfect for outside use in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a Christmas present. We are skiers and his fingers are always so cold that he is in pain. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: One glove doesn’t hold charges long enough we have returned and received another pair and have same problem. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer support!
customer_reviews.text: They fit well work as advertised and the seller stands behind their product very well!
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I cant charge the gloves I have the wrong charger,i can't plug it in to an out let.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warmed most of hand nicely did not warm finger tips where needed it most.
customer_reviews.author: ron e.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Charger was unable to plug in wall. The prongs at end are round. Was wondering need adapter?
customer_reviews.author: Brian Eaton unable to plug charger into outlet. The prongs are round at end. Unable to plug intoout.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect charger = unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: Received gloves today and charger was wrong, it had two round prongs instead of two flat prongs. Unable to use, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: the gloves work great but I’m not happy about the wrong unit being ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so the gloves came and the charging unit was European and I had to spend an additional $26 to buy a converter kit ...I know I could have sent them back but by the time I would get them back again I probably wouldnt need them... the gloves work great but I’m not happy about the wrong unit being sent 😡
customer_reviews.author: norm mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the way they were advertised
customer_reviews.text: My son tried these riding his motorcycle today and said his fingers and palms were cold. Disappointed in the way they were advertised.
customer_reviews.author: D B Dowrite

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Gloves never warmed up. Returned the item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: bruced39

customer_reviews.title: What video?
customer_reviews.text: Theses gloves SOUNED great. The directions to operate is very vague. Went to look for the "helpful" videos and couldn't open any videos at all. According to my husband the maximum heat is nothing to warm your hands. I'm extremely dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cgray

customer_reviews.title: Retuned defective , didn’t turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work when they arrived. Customer service promptly credited my account.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B

customer_reviews.title: The stitching on the fingers gave out the very first ...
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on the fingers gave out the very first time I use them I had to stitch them up
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: A complete waist of money
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are completely useless, the heaters are on the back of the hands, I don't ever remember the back of my hands being cold. There is no real insulation in the gloves so if you touch anything cold it goes straight through to your unheated hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to buy this sock. This experience makes me very disappointed, because the sock is broken after less than a week, because the battery doesn't work. I tried to contact the seller but got no reply, and the service attitude really makes me very disappointed and I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Buy in person not over the net
customer_reviews.text: I dont think they will last the stitching is a very poor quality and has already started to come undone they might be good in the deer stand just sitting still and not touching anything , for what I paid they should be a decent quality, I bought them so it's my fault for buying over the net
customer_reviews.author: Love monkey

product_meta.title: Electric Battery Heated Gloves for Women Men,Touchscreen Texting Water-resistant Thermal Heat Gloves,Electric Battery Heated Ski Bike Motorcycle Warm Gloves Hand Warmers,Winter Thermo Gloves
feature_bullets: 【BREATHABLE&WATERPROOF MATERIAL】Autocastle Electric Heating Gloves with Four Layers Special Design:Waterproof Coating Fabric+Extra Heavy Cotton+Invisibility Heat Chip+Reinforced PU leather.80% cotton+20%sponge Upgraded Lining makes the thermal heated gloves differs from Any Other Rechargeable Heated Gloves on Amazon.

【LARGE HEATING AREA】Autocastle 7.4V Electric Battery Heated Gloves with Li-ion Battery for Men and Women Mainly Heat Palm,Back of Hands,Small Part of Fingers.Large Heating Area Provide Hands with Enough Warm for Indoor Outdoor Sports Activities.Especially Good for People with Chronically Cold Hands to Spend Long Cold Winter Days!

【MULTIFUNCTIONAL&WIDE APPLICATION】Compact, Durable, and Versatile Electric Battery Heated Glove Can Use in a Wide Variety of Situations and Circumstances.Especially Perfect for Climbing Hiking Motorcycle Skiing Mountaineering Snowboarding Cycling and Hunting,etc.Great Relief for People with Raynaud’s Arthritis Bad Circulation&Stiff Joints,Elegant Package makes it Perfect for Gift Ideas to Family Members, Lover, Friends, Parents, Elders,Etc.

【TEMPERATURE ADJUSTABLE】Powered with Rechargeable 7.4V Li-ion Batteries,the temperature Can up to 150 Fahrenheit with the highest setting.Customized with 3 Heating Levels for Different Peoples’ Needs---Red/Green/Blue,this Kind of Heated Gloves can Not Only Offer Cozy Temperature with Long Lasting Using Hours,But Also Better Griping Experience.

【Special Notice】According to tens of thousands of investigation,Autocastle heated gloves are Perfectly Fit for Most people,But Still Please Make Sure Your Palm Width within 7-10INCH Before Ordering.Package Include: 2*gloves/2*batteries /1*charger /1* Exquisite Cardboard Box/1* using manual 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE GIVE YOURSELF AND BELOVED ONES A CHANCE TO SAY GOODBYE TO COLD DAYS,if you have any problems or questions,please do not hesitate to contact us,we will reply you ASAP.
